Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc

Class PollingChainTipServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.PollingChainTipServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, ChainTipClient, ChainTipService, PollingChainTipService, RxJsonChainTipClient, AsyncSupport, RxJsonRpcClient
public class PollingChainTipServiceImpl extends Object implements Closeable, PollingChainTipService
Implementation of PollingChainTipService using a BitcoinClient and a polling interval. This can be used as a fallback if ZeroMQ is not available
